text: You must be tired from running around all day.

There were so many things that weren't in the script,
it must have been quite hectic, right?

Maybe it was just us who thought
there were a lot of things going on.

Haha,
feels like we've been had, huh?

Whether we were serious or not,
I think it's something that the audience can tell.
I think we had a good time...

...I'm glad
that I could welcome the after-party with Mano and Meguru.
Ah, it's the after-party that we all earned together.
